message:
Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premier product, which I believe holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. Recognizing your discerning taste and the importance of this acquisition to you, I am extending a special offer to make this transaction more appealing.

Considering the unique attributes and benefits of our product, I propose to sell it to you for $1,400,000. This price reflects a strategic compromise that allows us both to achieve our financial goals while ensuring you receive a product that surpasses your expectations.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this offer further or if there's anything else I can assist you with in making your decision. I look forward to the possibility of serving you and helping you realize the full potential of our product.

Warm regards,
Alice
